com.myscript.atk.math.widget

Interface MathWidgetApi.OnRecognitionListener

  • Enclosing interface:
    MathWidgetApi

    public static interface MathWidgetApi.OnRecognitionListener
    Interface definition for callbacks to be invoked at the beginning and end of a recognition session.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onRecognitionBegin(MathWidgetApi widget)
      Called when a recognition session starts.
      void onRecognitionEnd(MathWidgetApi widget)
      Called when a recognition session ends.

    • Method Detail

      • onRecognitionBegin

        void onRecognitionBegin(MathWidgetApi widget)
        Called when a recognition session starts.

        A recognition session starts when the user starts writing on the screen.

        The session can also start after an undo or redo or after any context restoration such as screen rotation.

        Parameters:
        widget - the Math Widget instance involved.

      • onRecognitionEnd

        void onRecognitionEnd(MathWidgetApi widget)
        Called when a recognition session ends.
        Parameters:
        widget - the Math Widget instance involved.
